snippet.title: Matildas v Japan live stream: Kick-off time, line ups, how to watch, scores, updates, TV
snippet.content:
The Matildas take on Japan on Monday morning.
Share
FRESH off recording their first ever win over the USA, the Matildas continue their Tournament of Nations action with another key clash with Japan. A lone goal from Tameka Butt earned the Aussies a win over the world champion Americans for the first time in 27 attempts and now Japan, the reigning Asian champions are next. The Matildas famously beat Japan on route to qualifying for the 2016 Rio Olympics. You can watch the Matildas v Japan in the Tournament of Nations from 7.15am AEST Monday on Fox Sports 503.
Originally published as
